message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with pursuit-evasion scenarios, which are commonly studied in game theory (cs.GT) and robotics (cs.RO). The use of partial observability and the advantage given to the evader suggest a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the algorithmic approach and the use of value iteration suggest a connection to machine learning (cs.LG).
